name: EnerGaia Pte. Ltd.
description: Producer of algae products intended to provide a clean, healthy, and sustainable food source. The company offers a wide range of Spirulina-based products ranging from fresh powder, energy balls, and pasta, enabling consumers to get fresh and sustainable algae products.
one_liner: Producer of algae products intended to provide a clean, healthy, and sustainable food source. The company offers a wide range of Spirulina-based products ranging from fresh powder, energy balls, and pasta, enabling consumers to get fresh and sustainable algae products.
